detail_desc: Short, sleeveless dress in sturdy jersey with a low-cut back, seam at the waist and flared skirt. The polyester content of the dress is partly recycled.
Blouse in airy satin with a lace yoke, sewn in wrapover at the front and a V-neck with a concealed button. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Wide, V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with a pompom trim at the top and on the sleeves. Gathered yoke at the back and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Boots in imitation leather with a quilted shaft in woven fabric and a zip on the inside. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Boots in imitation leather with a quilted shaft in woven fabric and a zip on the inside. Faux fur linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Satin-covered Alice band with a glittery, padded appliqué in the shape of a Christmas tree decorated with small metal bells.

Ankle-length trousers in twill with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and wide, tapered legs.

Ankle-length trousers in twill with a high paper bag waist with pleats and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly, concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and wide, tapered legs.
Straight-cut jacket in a textured, striped cotton and viscose weave. Notch lapels, patch front pockets and buttons at the front. Lined.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, shoulder straps that cross at the back, a low-cut back and high-cut legs.
Glittery Alice band with ears and padded antlers on top.
Sleeveless blouse in a crinkled cotton weave with embroidery and a round neckline with a V-shaped opening and twisted ties at the front.
Off-the-shoulder top in an airy cotton weave with elastication and a wide flounce with broderie anglaise at the top.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with a round, gathered neckline and buttons down the front. Long balloon sleeves with hole embroidery and elastication at the cuffs.
Flip flops with rubber straps (elastic around the heels in sizes 7 to 9 1/2) and fluted rubber soles with a print motif on top.
Shirt dress in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Glittery Alice band decorated with a fabric Santa hat.
Satin-covered Alice band with a glittery felt crown on top. Faux fur at the base of the crown.
Hair set with two hair elastics and two hair clips decorated with butterflies. Length of hair clips 5 cm.
Fabric-covered Alice band with a bow on top.
Metal hair clips with glittery decorations. Size 4 cm.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch cotton weave with narrow notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and two inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Sleeveless, V-neck dress in woven fabric with decorative knot details, gathers at the shoulders and an elasticated seam under the bust with ties. Satin lining.
Block-print T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Block-print T-shirt in cotton jersey.

Suit trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.

Suit trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side pockets, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ears on the top and a ribbed hem.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ears on the top and a ribbed hem.
Hat knitted in a soft cotton blend with ears on the top and a ribbed hem.

Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and a frill at the hems. Unlined.

Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck, wrapover front with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and 3/4-length sleeves with ties at the cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist, side pockets and a frill at the hems. Unlined.
Straight-cut, sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. Round neck, a pleat at the front, buttons at the back and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Straight-cut, sleeveless blouse in woven fabric with a sheen. Round neck, a pleat at the front, buttons at the back and a straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy viscose weave with a small stand-up collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets and a rounded hem.
Biker boots in imitation leather with a decorative tab and zip in one side. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel approx. 4 cm.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an elasticated top with a small frill trim, narrow tie-top shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an elasticated top with a small frill trim, narrow tie-top shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an elasticated top with a small frill trim, narrow tie-top shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in woven fabric with an elasticated top with a small frill trim, narrow tie-top shoulder straps and short, wide sleeves.
Blouse in a patterned weave with a round neck and long sleeves with pleats and buttoned cuffs. Opening and a concealed button at the back of the neck and a seam at the hem with a tie detail.
Short-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Short-sleeved jumper in a fine-knit viscose blend with ribbing around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed boat neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed boat neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a ribbed boat neck and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and twisted side seams.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Short sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband.
Soft toy made of soft velour with polyester padding dressed in a removable tulle dress with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Length approx. 23 cm.
Velour soft toy with embroidered appliqués and a removable monster costume. Polyester filling. Length approx. 22 cm.
Soft pile bag decoration with appliqués and embroidered details. Metal carabiner hook at the top. Polyester padding. Length approx. 13 cm.
Soft toy made of soft velour with polyester padding and embroidered appliqués, dressed in a removable tulle dress and cape. The dress has a hook and loop fastening at the back. Length approx. 23 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of jersey leggings. Top with a motif, gently dropped shoulders, and ribbing at the neckline and cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of jersey leggings. Top with a motif, gently dropped shoulders, and ribbing at the neckline and cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of jersey leggings. Top with a motif, gently dropped shoulders, and ribbing at the neckline and cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric and a pair of jersey leggings. Top with a motif, gently dropped shoulders, and ribbing at the neckline and cuffs. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Soft toy made of soft velour with polyester padding dressed in a removable tulle dress with a hook and loop fastening at the back. Length approx. 26 cm.
Thin socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Trainers in glittery imitation leather with a padded edge, faux-fur tongue, an adjustable hook and loop tab with an appliqué and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Fully-fashioned trainers with rubber details, elasticated lacing and loops front and back. Mesh insoles and rubber soles.
Scuba trainers with imitation leather details, a strap with a hook and loop fastening and decorative flowers at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups, wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.
Nursing bras in soft stretch fabric with opening, lined cups, wide elastication under the bust and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Seamless.

Short, fitted dress in stretch fabric with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative buttons, and 3/4-length sleeves. Detachable, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Unlined.

Short, fitted dress in stretch fabric with a diagonal zip down the front, notch lapels with decorative buttons, and 3/4-length sleeves. Detachable, adjustable belt with a metal buckle at the waist. Unlined.
V-neck blouse in woven fabric with short cap sleeves, buttons down the front and a seam with ties under the bust.
Bikini top with underwired, mesh-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide metal fastening at the back.
Hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim approx. 7 cm.
Hat in felted wool with a band. Width of brim approx. 7 cm.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and contrasting colour trims.
Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and contrasting colour trims.
